main event: One cigar-shaped object with a large front light was observed hovering over March AFB, then started moving erratically and landed out of sight.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 5 to 6 minutes.,The object was observed moving erratically before it landed out of sight.,The sighting was attributed to possibly being a balloon.,The sighting occurred in the afternoon of 17 March 1957.,The object was seen near a military base, March AFB.
sighted object: one cigar-shaped object with a large front light
